body_html: I often encounter this error when the initialization of a layer is bad. For instance, yesterday I was getting this error because I initialized an attention layer using nn.init.uniform_(tensor, 0, 1). When I changed it to nn.init.uniform(tensor, -0.5, 0.5), the issue went away.

body: I often encounter this error when the initialization of a layer is bad. For instance, yesterday I was getting this error because I initialized an attention layer using `nn.init.uniform_(tensor, 0, 1)`. When I changed it to `nn.init.uniform(tensor, -0.5, 0.5)`, the issue went away.
